name: content_area
objective: Check that for each tab, the content appears in the content area  of the home sreen settings window
description: The content of each tab (application icons, widgets, recent files, pictures) should be displayed in the content area of the window.
pre_condition: open the homescreen settings panel (user menu -> settings -> gnome-control-center opens -> click on home screen settings icon)

steps.description: observe the home screen settings panel
steps.expected: the following tabs must be visible: 'Applications', 'Widgets', 'Recent Files', 'Background'
the content area must switch to the widget settings
the content area must switch to the recent files settings
the content area must switch to the background settings
